org.whired.ghost.net
Class GhostFrame

java.lang.Object
  org.whired.ghost.net.GhostFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
AbstractClient, SessionEventListener, Receivable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GhostClientFrame, RemoteGhostFrame
public abstract class GhostFrame
extends java.lang.Object
implements Receivable, AbstractClient

Provides the functionality and layout for a standard implementation of a JFrame that will utilize Ghost's core functionality

Author:
Whired
